detectors.description: Random.randNum(uint256,uint256) (Random.sol#10-12) uses a weak PRNG: uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(seed,block.difficulty,block.timestamp))) % length (Random.sol#11)
ReLoot.ProbabilityGenerator(uint8) (ReLoot.sol#286-292) uses a weak PRNG: Random.randNum(_seed,100) < x (ReLoot.sol#288)
